ing: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This salad has been a required dish at Thanksgiving and Xmas for over 25 years at our house. It is our absolute favorite and so easy to fix! Enjoy!"
ins:
Mix together the cherry pie filling, condensed milk, oranges, pineapple, coconut, marshmallows and whipped topping.
Chill for several hours and top with crushed pecans if desired.
